comment:
The fun we had 
Problems we solved ,
Anime we watched  and
The projects we (you) made,
Most importantly the motivation you ignited to Learn.
Really really grateful for everything man. Thanks
name: Vansh Kathnawal

comment: Very humble and funny guy , hamesha hasta hai aur hasata hai , har technical problem ka solution hai aur new anime ka suggestion hai and 206 ka best chef. Wish you all the Best !!!
name: BHUPESH KUMAR

comment: A great hardworking guy who will never stop trying. Pro in watching anime (knows a lot of them!); I really enjoyed those anime watching and catch up sessions, especially the late night ones. Had a great time bullying the gandaaa pro Saral in creative ways! Wishing you all the best for your future!
name: Omkar Shirgaonkar

comment: Most hardworking person I ever met and humble one as well.thanks for helping me in starting CP and Development as well and thanks for helping in resolving a lot of bugs ,During exams he be like- just chill I'll teach.All the best bhai keep shining.
name: Prashant Rao

comment: Lord Chinmay, Thanks Bhai har semester exam pass karvane ke liye, ek chiz mujhe pata thi subhe to Chinmay padha hi dega 😂 to tension kyu lena. All the best Bhai, always here to help you.
name: Prahlad Pawar

comment: Bhai musibat ke waqt mai hamesha saath hota hai 😂. He's a really hardworking, helpful, and simple guy. Ask him for anime suggestions; you'll not regret it but be thankful. Only we know how we study for exams in the last semester 😂. Thanks for helping me in everything, BTP partner 🥂.
name: Varun Kumar

comment: Just one word for you a "LORD"😈😈. Thank you bhai. Bohot accha time gujaara hai tumhara saath🫂🫂. Tumhare wo roasts nahi bhul sakta hai. Apna aashirwad banaye rakhna🙏🙏.  Aur challenge lete rehna.
name: Ayush

comment:
LORD Chinmay, Apna toh CPI me same range ka hai bhai, But still tera calm & composed behavior and dedication towards coding is always an inspiration for me. Ur smile never showed the struggles that u used to face.
I will always miss a legend/lord frnd like u.
Best wishes, always available to help u
name: Sanskar Gupta

comment: Lord of all things. He is the guy to talk to as he understands everyone well. Hope to be connected with you in future
name: Akshat Nahata

comment: LORD haii Bhai is duniya ke liye bhut innocent haii. Thanks Bhai DSA ke doubts solve krne ke liye. Be always happy......
name: Harsh Jain
